summary:
Services and Customer Support:
* Roll-out and introduction of software products and applications for high volume production for electronic equipment
* Sales support & Innovation
* Consulting
* Respondable for manuals and product documentation
* Service information and product launch information
* Training development, planning
* Spare part logisics and control
* Workshops and training
* Sustaining (aftersales)
* Expert in support of professional equipment (B2B)

Life Science instrument support

ICT
Experienced with computer systems and related software:
* Operating systems like Windows, Linux, Unix, HP-UX, Solaris, OS/2
* Network maintenance and expertise (Hardware and software), Security & Data protection (Accounts, spam, virus protection, backup, uptime), Internet and Intranet (Configuration Management Systems)
* Office packages Word, Excel, Powerpoint. Visio
* DTP and other graphical software packages like Adobe Acrobat, Framemaker, Illustrator, Photoshop
* Multimedia software like Premiere Pinnacle Studio, Mediastudio
* Markup-languages like html, xml and protocols like SOAP, CAMx 

Production:
* Factory/Production automation
* Production Preperation
* Production Engineering
* Testings
* Production Quality

Specialties: 
* Optics & Laser
* ESD
* Fluidics
* Robotics and Mechatronics (Software, Vision, Electronics and Mechanics)
* Surface Mount Technology (Back-end semiconductor)
* General Machine/Robot technology
* Optimizing of machine process programs
* Production/Flowline/Shop floor automation
* Barcode technoloy

Automation:
* CAD & CAM
* Product and software creation
* Familiar with content managment systems(IMS, Teamcenter, Agile)
* logistic control software (MFGPro)
* Sales systems (SalesForce)

location.default: Beek en Donk, North Brabant, Netherlands

education.field_of_study: Dutch, Math, Physics, Analog electronics, Digital Electronics, Control theory

profile_positions.description:
Introduce the TEM server software for manufacturing and technical support.
Work with production support staff to help solve problems and maintain the manufacturing
Work with technical support staff to introduce the newly launched software
Setup engineering requirements for  future releases

profile_positions.title: Senior software product specialist/support engineer

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the worldwide support of 2 products (Applications) that are used for production machines (component mounting)
• Responsible for manual creation, training creation and conduction training 
• Support worldwide regional and local engineers
• Join in development projects to set the requirements serviceability and maintainability.
• Team-member during the creation of new products (Product Creation Process)
• Organize sustaining activities (first and third line customer support activities)
profile_positions.title: Customer Support Product Specialist

profile_positions.description: Advise and implement network&server configuration, setup systems and configure to do eternal control over these systems.
profile_positions.title: System & Network Administrator

profile_positions.description:
To support production by:
Creating customized process programs for Surface Mount Placement Machines.
Creating customized drilling programs.
Support production by special request
profile_positions.title: Production Preperation Engineer Professional Equipment

profile_positions.description:
To configure and test the full functionallity of the Philips Micro Development Systems. These systems were used for development of hardware and software of processor equiped electronics.
The configuration includes the software and manuals the needed to be combined and installed
profile_positions.title: Configuration & Tester
